articles.content: Apple started streaming its WWDC events on YouTube back in 2020 when the COVID-19 pandemic began. Over time, the brand moved to a hybrid format with in-person events and pre-recorded videos, but all … [+680 chars]

articles.title: End of an Era: Final Delta IV Heavy Rocket Carries NROL-70 on Historic Mission - Space Daily
articles.description:
Space Coast FL (SPX) Mar 27, 2024 - 
The last mission of the venerable Delta IV Heavy rocket, marked by the launch of the NROL-70 security payload, is scheduled for March 28, 2024, at 1:40 PM EDT from SLC 37, Cape Canaveral Space Force
